subject: Take a Tour: 7 Dream Bathrooms in Burraneer
preview: We recently had the pleasure of helping Larissa bring her dream home to life in beautiful Burraneer-and the result is nothing short of breathtaking. From seven luxurious bathrooms to a custom-designed

full_threads.body:
We recently had the pleasure of helping Larissa bring her dream home to life in beautiful Burraneer-and the result is nothing short of breathtaking. From seven luxurious bathrooms to a custom-designed mosaic, every space reflects timeless elegance and meticulous detail.

Take a closer look at the stunning Rubik Sage Green mosaic, green timber vanities, bespoke brass accents, and the beautiful tiles that brought this vision to life. Discover the full transformation and explore the tiles used in her project-read the full story on the blog.
Read The Blog
